config.fabrizoom.title: FabriZoom Config
config.fabrizoom.cinematic_camera.toolti: Defines the cinematic camera while zooming.
config.fabrizoom.reduce_sensitivity.tool: Reduces the mouse sensitivity when zooming.
config.fabrizoom.zoom_mode.tooltip: The behavior of the zoom key.
config.fabrizoom.zoom_mode.tooltip.hold: "Hold" needs the zoom key to be hold.
config.fabrizoom.zoom_mode.tooltip.toggl: "Toggle" has the zoom key toggle the zoom.
config.fabrizoom.zoom_scrolling.tooltip: Allows to increase or decrease zoom by scrolling.
config.fabrizoom.extra_keybinds.tooltip: Adds zoom manipulation keys along with the zoom key.
A restart will be required in order to apply the changes.
config.fabrizoom.zoom_overlay.tooltip.1: Adds an overlay in the screen during zoom.
config.fabrizoom.zoom_overlay.tooltip.2: The overlay texture can be found in:
config.fabrizoom.zoom_divisor.tooltip: The divisor applied to the FOV's zoom multiplier.
config.fabrizoom.minimum_zoom_divisor.to: The minimum value that you can scroll down.
config.fabrizoom.maximum_zoom_divisor.to: The maximum value that you can scroll up.
config.fabrizoom.scroll_step.tooltip.1: The number which is de/incremented by zoom scrolling.
config.fabrizoom.scroll_step.tooltip.2: Used when the zoom divisor is above the starting point.
config.fabrizoom.lesser_scroll_step.tool: The number which is de/incremented by zoom scrolling.
Used when the zoom divisor is below the starting point.
config.fabrizoom.cinematic_multiplier.to: The multiplier used for the multiplied cinematic camera.
config.fabrizoom.smooth_multiplier.toolt: The multiplier used for smooth transitions.
config.fabrizoom.minimum_linear_step.too: The minimum value which the linear transition step can reach.
config.fabrizoom.maximum_linear_step.too: The maximum value which the linear transition step can reach.
config.fabrizoom.reset_zoom_with_mouse.t: Allows for resetting the zoom with the middle mouse button.
config.fabrizoom.reset_to_preset.tooltip: Resets the config in a specific way once saved.
"Classic" makes the mod imitate OptiFine's zoom.
"Persistent" is based on the "Persistent" zoom mode.
toast.fabrizoom.title: Ok Zoomer
